Uses of Class
com.ibm.db2.r2dbc.DB2Connection

    • Uses of DB2Connection in com.ibm.db2.r2dbc

      Methods in com.ibm.db2.r2dbc that return DB2Connection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DB2Connection DB2Result.getConnection()
      Returns the connection associated with this result set.
      DB2Connection DB2PreparedStatement.getConnection()
      Gets the database connection associated with this statement.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<DB2Connection> DB2ConnectionFactory.create()
      Factory method to create DB2Connection object reactively.

      Gets a free DB2Connection from the pool.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> DB2ConnectionFactory.init(DB2Connection c)
      User can override this method to do initialization tasks on the connection just created.
